Name: BEATris
About the game: BEATris : Rhythm! Puzzle! Action! Survive the block-hell situation until the end of the music. Control the blocks falling with the beats and fill the lines to destroy them. Enjoy the music while the level shifts with the rhythm. BEATris presents a new wave in rhythm game genre. Inspired by the classic puzzle game Tetris, the game gives you a strategic gameplay with the rhythmical flow from the music. Features Various EDM Soundtracks to enjoy Unique levels that are brutally fun Make creative levels with your favorite music on Level Editor Share your levels on Steam Workshop With Steam Cloud integration, create your level anywhere everwhere
